explanation: The bug in the program is in the calculation of the probability for Iroha-chan to get a T-shirt. The original line calculates the probability using the total number of participants in the range, (B - A), instead of the correct range which is (B - A - 1) since we want the participants ranked from (A+1) to B (inclusive), leading to a total count of (B - A). This issue is similar to the concept of counting elements in a range, which is a common fix in similar bug patterns. I corrected the line to accurately calculate this probability using (B - A - 1).
